pageContext.claim: “The United States lost 500 auto and auto parts factories under the Obama-Biden disaster.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump misses some important context here. The Detroit Free Press wrote, “The nation shed 622 auto and auto parts firms during the eight years of the Obama administration, but most of those losses occurred during a recession already underway when Obama took office. Growth in the  number of firms began late in Obama's first term, continued through his second term and through the first three years of Trump's term.”
